title: Free camping locations around the world...

posts.content:
Found an 'app' called Parking4Night which is a list of camping areas, rest areas etc etc.

There's a filter function so you can search for paid sites, free locations, fuel, etc etc.

Seems that the info is uploaded by the users of the app, so some info is basic, others are more compressive with photos, available services etc.

There's a PC version too, but the app seems to work better.

Thought this might be of use to anyone else that likes a spot of free camping.

Thanks Jim, have been looking for something like this since they started putting camera enforcement on all my usual spots.

It's called park4night.com on the iPhone app store if anyone's searching.
Will take a look, no harm having the app installed, you never know when it might come in handy
